content.description:
Propaganda poster of the French Communist party, circa 1950Private Collection/Bridgeman Images

The text reads: “American occupation is war” and “Let us free France from the Atlantic pact!”
content.question: The fears the poster was intended to manipulate were largely in response to which of the following developments?

choices.label: The increasing American cultural influence in Europe after the Second World War
The possibility that the Cold War could lead to a larger, potentially nuclear, conflict
The devastation inflicted by Allied air raids on Germany during the Second World War
The Soviet blockade of Allied-occupied West Berlin and subsequent aid airlift

content.answer: The possibility that the Cold War could lead to a larger, potentially nuclear, conflict
